thread.title: Blind Child Knows Every Barcelona Player By Touch
thread.title_full: Blind Child Knows Every Barcelona Player By Touch

author: Daniel Utts
title: Blind Child Knows Every Barcelona Player By Touch
text:
Blind Child Knows Every Barcelona Player By Touch FanDuel 1 day ago Daniel Utts Â© FanDuel Insider
AdChoices Mamadou Lamine is a typical child in many ways, and he shares his love of soccer with millions of others around the world. However, what makes Lamine different is that he was born blind, so he has never actually seen the players on Barcelona he roots for every single week. Despite his handicap, he has a unique skill of being able to identify the players by touch.
Thanks to listening to so many games and having others describe players to him, Lamine has turned into a superfan for Barcelona. It might seem like an impossible trick to be able to identify players this way, but he was tested time and time again and was able to guess every player correctly. It was a once in a lifetime opportunity for Lamine as well, as he was able to meet his idols. By the end of the meeting, the Barcelona players were in many ways looking up to him.
The post Blind Child Knows Every Barcelona Player By Touch appeared first on FanDuel Insider .
